attributes.action: Prosecution for members of the government which seek to mislead the public
attributes.additional_details: Excessive division altering the course of accurate voting
attributes.background: The public depend on valid and true information in order to make democratic decisions

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the decision on whether to prosecute someone is a decision for the police and crown prosecution service and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232305
